main event: Two unidentified lights were observed hovering in the sky over Cyprus Island on 26 October 1953.
interesting points: The lights were described as white or bluish,The observation lasted for approximately 10 seconds,No aircraft or balloons were reported in the area at the time,The observers described the lights as moving at a high rate of speed before descending abruptly,The sighting was confirmed by multiple witnesses who had no prior experience with such objects.
witness description: Both observers were standing in an open field without any visual aids and ruled out reflections.
